MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:47AM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:10AM on 05 November 2020.
